herosection.title: From Ideology to Practice
herosection.description:
Every project is born from a concept — and comes to life when
transformed into reality.

profile.title: Developer Profile
profile.subtitle: FullStack Developer & Designer focused on creating innovative digital experiences, passionate about clean code, design, and technology.
profile.bio:
I'm Victor, I'm 18 years old and I love creating unique and creative solutions, simple and with a significant impact. I work with front-end using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind, and I really enjoy turning wireframes into live interfaces, with both aesthetics and functionality.
Besides programming and design, I also study marketing and languages. My goal is to launch my own projects, like SaaS and e-books, and make the CenterCafé community grow more and more. I like to understand people's perspectives and use that to create something that truly stands out.

projectsProfile.title: Recent Projects
projectsProfile.subtitle: Highlights of projects developed with a focus on experience, technology, and real results.

projects.title: DHeroCorp
projects.subtitle: Design, Programming and Digital Products Solutions
projects.description: Company dedicated to offering personalized UI/UX design and web development services, as well as a growing line of digital products that meet various modern market needs.
projects.challenge: Demonstrate the breadth and quality of services, building a strong visual identity and intuitive interfaces that please the client experience.
projects.solution: Development of a responsive website with React and Next.js, using TypeScript to ensure scalability and maintenance. Creation of a striking visual identity and integration of tools that enhance communication and interaction with the public.
projects.results: Greater brand recognition, increased customer engagement, and establishment of a solid foundation for expanding products and services.

projects.title: CenterCafé
projects.subtitle: Discord Community
projects.description: CenterCafé is a community made to connect people on Discord, focused on networking, knowledge sharing, and events.
projects.challenge: Revitalize the server, promoting a welcoming and inclusive environment where everyone feels comfortable to participate, regardless of area or interest — despite recent drops in activity.
projects.solution: To revive the server, we are planning to restructure channels, strengthen the moderation team, and organize events to ensure a safe, organized, and welcoming environment for all.
projects.results: Constant growth of the member base, high participation in activities, and strengthening of community bonds.

services.title: Professional Services
services.subtitle: Complete digital solutions focused on user experience, performance, and conversion. Select a service to see details.
services.all_packages: All packages include alignment meetings, on-time delivery, and post-launch support for adjustments. Custom projects are available for specific needs.
services.contact_for_eval: Contact us for a detailed project evaluation.
services.portfolio_intro: Check out some recent projects developed with a focus on performance, user experience, and business results.
services.portfolio_empty: No projects registered in this category yet.

serviceDetails.title: Front-end Development
serviceDetails.description: I turn ideas into modern, responsive, and high-performance interfaces using React and Next.js to create smooth and impactful user experiences.
features: Responsive websites and web apps optimized for all devices
Smooth animations and interactions with Framer Motion and GSAP
Modern SPAs built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript
RESTful API integration for dynamic content
Optimized performance, fast loading, and SEO-ready structure
Basic accessibility practices to reach all users

serviceDetails.title: UI/UX Design
serviceDetails.description: I design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces focused on user experience, aligning your brand identity with clean, functional visuals.
features: Custom visual design for up to 5 screens
Basic style guide creation for visual consistency
Responsive layouts for both mobile and desktop
Up to 2 rounds of revision based on feedback
Support for implementing the visual design in code

serviceDetails.title: Full-Stack Development
serviceDetails.description: I build complete applications from front to back with a focus on performance, scalability, and user experience, using modern and efficient technologies.
features: Complete structure for modern web applications
REST API development with basic authentication
Integration with third-party services via API
Simple admin panels for content management
Optimized deployment using Vercel or similar platforms

Front-end Development.title: Technical Briefing
Front-end Development.description: Meeting to understand technical needs, features, and interface goals.
Front-end Development.details: Detailed analysis of project requirements, visual and functional expectations, aligning both project needs and user demands to define the front-end development scope.

Front-end Development.title: Project Structure
Front-end Development.description: Organization of the project foundation: components, navigation, and interface flow.
Front-end Development.details: Planning the project architecture, choosing tools (such as modern frameworks), organizing components, and managing data flow.

Front-end Development.title: Functional Prototype
Front-end Development.description: Development of initial component versions to validate ideas and interactions.
Front-end Development.details: Creation of early prototypes to test usability and interaction, ensuring the concept works before final development.

Front-end Development.title: Interface Development
Front-end Development.description: Building the interface with a focus on structure, code reuse, and modern visuals.
Front-end Development.details: Implementation of interface elements, prioritizing code maintainability, best practices, and performance for a consistent user experience.

Front-end Development.title: Adjustments and Testing
Front-end Development.description: Performing tests and refinements to ensure proper functionality across devices and browsers.
Front-end Development.details: Validation of compatibility, responsiveness, and performance to deliver a seamless experience across platforms.

Front-end Development.title: Launch and Support
Front-end Development.description: Project launch and support for any necessary fixes or improvements.
Front-end Development.details: Deployment of the application in a live environment, with ongoing support to resolve issues and implement enhancements.

UI/UX Design.title: User Research
UI/UX Design.description: Understanding the target audience, their needs, and challenges to guide the design process.
UI/UX Design.details: Interviews and research to identify user pain points and expectations, helping shape an effective user experience.

UI/UX Design.title: Wireframes and Flows
UI/UX Design.description: Building the structural layout and user navigation paths.
UI/UX Design.details: Design of wireframes that organize content and define the user journey through the interface.

UI/UX Design.title: Visual Design
UI/UX Design.description: Defining the visual style: colors, typography, icons, and product identity.
UI/UX Design.details: Creation of a cohesive aesthetic aligned with the brand, ensuring a consistent visual language throughout the product.

UI/UX Design.title: Interactive Prototype
UI/UX Design.description: Creating a functional simulation to test navigation and appearance.
UI/UX Design.details: Development of clickable prototypes to validate interaction and layout before implementation.

UI/UX Design.title: Usability Testing
UI/UX Design.description: Testing with users to identify areas for improvement.
UI/UX Design.details: Analysis of how users interact with the prototype to detect confusion or friction points and optimize the design accordingly.

UI/UX Design.title: Final Delivery
UI/UX Design.description: Documentation and file preparation for development handoff.
UI/UX Design.details: Providing organized design files and clear guidelines to ensure proper implementation by the development team.

Full-Stack Development.title: Project Definition
Full-Stack Development.description: Aligning technical and functional requirements for both front-end and back-end.
Full-Stack Development.details: Comprehensive understanding of the project, defining technologies and features needed for the system.

Full-Stack Development.title: Database Planning
Full-Stack Development.description: Structuring the database to organize and store information efficiently.
Full-Stack Development.details: Development of the data model, defining relationships and access methods focused on performance and security.

Full-Stack Development.title: Back-end Development
Full-Stack Development.description: Building the system logic that processes data and communicates with the database.
Full-Stack Development.details: Implementation of business rules, security, and integration with external services to ensure system functionality.

Full-Stack Development.title: Front-end Development
Full-Stack Development.description: Creating the visual interface integrated with system features.
Full-Stack Development.details: Implementation of the user interface, ensuring efficient communication between front-end and back-end.

Full-Stack Development.title: Complete Testing
Full-Stack Development.description: Testing the entire system to ensure proper and integrated operation.
Full-Stack Development.details: Validation of system performance, stability, and functionality under real usage scenarios.

Full-Stack Development.title: Deployment and Monitoring
Full-Stack Development.description: Releasing the system to production and providing continuous monitoring.
Full-Stack Development.details: Making the system available to users and monitoring for maintenance, bug fixes, and updates as needed.

UI/UX Design.title: Essential UI
UI/UX Design.subtitle: Single Project
features: Visual design of up to 5 screens

UI/UX Design.title: Complete UX/UI
UI/UX Design.subtitle: Single Project
features: Visual design of up to 12 screens

Full-Stack Development.title: DHeroCorp
Full-Stack Development.description: Institutional platform for the DHeroCorp brand, showcasing digital products, creative services, and integration with the CenterCafé community ecosystem and bots.

Full-Stack Development.title: SOS Bom Humor
Full-Stack Development.description: Complete institutional website for the SOS Bom Humor Doutores Palhaços, a volunteer group from Ibirubá, RS, bringing joy and hope to patients in hospitals, nursing homes, and special education institutions across the region through theatrical performances and music.

Full-Stack Development.title: CenterCafé Bot
Full-Stack Development.description: Discord bot system for the CenterCafé community with moderation features, website integration, and a web-based admin panel under development.
